group_1.narration: If I become a Devil, I'll surely kill someone. @I couldn't be someone who'd save the Land of the Rising Sun. @I want to tell everyone, but I can't do anything more.

group_1.textCenter: *Gasp*...
What's this voice...?!

group_1.narration: Though my body may be a Diviner's,@to become a Devil is tantamount to death. @Though I may protect one person tomorrow, @I may well kill a hundred the day after.

group_1.textCenter: (The Devil...?)

group_1.textRight: Don't look at me...

group_1.narration: Thusly tainted, thus stained, thus impure.

group_1.textRight: Stop... Don't say that...!

group_1.narration: In the end, mine body is naught but a subject of appraisal.

group_1.textRight: (This is...)

group_1.narration: One gin, two gin, one ryō, two ryō, @thusly price label'd, display'd in shops.

group_1.textRight: (From within my body...!)

group_1.narration: Mine life doth not be mine own. @Raised, sold, made a Devil, then to do nothing@but sully this hateful mortal shore.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... Yeah... I have no idea what should come next.
Because we're beings that are guaranteed to become Devils...
We won't do the Land of the Rising Sun any good. @That's why it was all set up to kill us.
Even if it meant putting prices on our lives...
What Mikoshiba did might have been right.
I mean, I've been living within these traditions all my life...!
I don't want to think about what comes after @defeating it.
Because it's terrifying, isn't it?!

group_1.textCenter: Ggh...!
Putting prices on our lives is wrong...!
You told me I was one of the greatest people you @knew, Shizuka, and you were right.
There's no difference between lives!
That's what I want to hear from you. Keep that @honor with you, and just do as much @as you possibly can.
Even if we become Devils someday,
all we have to do is fight as hard as we can for the @Land of the Rising Sun until then!
And at some point along the way, a new path for us...
should turn up somewhere, shouldn't it?!
Let's find it together, Shizuka!
[flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]Just as the two of you forgave me,
I will continue to heal your heart in return...!

group_1.textRight: Sunao...

group_1.textCenter: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Guaaagh! Aaah!
*Cough, cough*...
I guess I was too tiny to cushion you guys...

group_1.textRight: Chiharu...

group_1.textCenter: Hey, listen to me...
I didn't tell you what the book said about the @Tokimes yet, did I?

group_1.narration: See, before the Mikoshibas came... @The Tokime people considered their country's affairs @all on their own, and they decided what wishes @they'd grant of their own will.
It seems like the Mikoshibas took over during a period @of terrible war, when nobody could be trusted @and there were no Diviners left...
But up until then, everyone who came of age @really did venture outside.
And they knew about their relationship with Devils. @But this is how the Tokimes came to think about it:
"If I offered my soul to the Land of the Rising Sun, @my honor can be maintained."
"Even if I were to become a Devil, @what I have achieved will never be erased."

group_1.textRight: That's...

group_1.textCenter: If I literally sacrificed my soul to the Land of the @Rising Sun...
My honor can be maintained...!
Even if I become a Devil, it won't erase anything that I've achieved.
I can be proud of that, and so I can fight till I @eventually fall...!

group_1.textRight: That's what I said to Mikoshiba...

group_1.textCenter: You did say so...
So, here's what I think:
There's not a spot of Mikoshiba in your soul, Shizuka.@The Tokimes have always lived on in you.
So let's do just what Sunao said! Let's find that path together!

group_1.textRight: Sorry...
I was the one who fell to the Devil's power...
But I've opened my eyes...!

group_1.textCenter: 蟆剰ｳ｢励＞滉Ч偵Щ九↑！

group_1.textRight: All three of us need to get some distance from it!

group_1.textCenter: Okay!

group_1.textRight: I'm glad it was the three of us.
I want to win with all three of us together, @and find our new future!
So!
Let's see our ancestors off together, as we set them free!
*Inhale*...
Sword of Tokime...
Carve the path to our future...!!
